snippet.title: Imp of the Sun - Console Announcement Trailer | ESRB
snippet.description:
Imp of the Sun is heading to consoles and PC on March 24! 

Restore the Sun’s light and end the Eternal Eclipse in this 2D, fast-paced metroidvania inspired by Peruvian cultures. Explore hand-crafted environments, battle and improve your skills to defeat the Four Keepers that stole the power of the Sun.

Imp of the Sun will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Steam and Epic Games Store!
